TopicTitle: KSP crashes when switching craft from map, tracking station, or going into tracking station.

Articles.Content:
Like the tile says, whenever I go into the tracking station, or while switching craft from the map, or taking control of a craft from the tracking station.

Plus TUFX, Waterfall, and Luciole.

I don't think this has to do with Hardware, but just in case:

CPU: Intel i5-6500

GPU: Intel HD Graphics 530

RAM: 8GB

And I couldn't find the crash.dmp, only the Error and Player logs.

I think you’re just running out of RAM, the error when the game crashes is a system out of memory error. 

DynamicHeapAllocator out of memory - Could not get memory for large allocation 178956976!
Could not allocate memory: System out of memory!

You’re running quite a lot of mods for only 8GB of RAM, so either reduce your mod count or if possible get some more RAM. (Or is that “MOAR RAM!”?)

1 hour ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

I think you’re just running out of RAM

Odd, because whenever KSP crashes, my Task Manager never shows a spike.

53 minutes ago, GuessingEveryDay said:

Odd, because whenever KSP crashes, my Task Manager never shows a spike.

Happens too fast.

You most likely are out of memory as @jimmymcgoochie said above.

Edited December 14, 2020 by linuxgurugamer

Okay, now I can enter the Tracking station without crashing, but switching craft from the map still crashes it. I removed KSC Extended, and it's running better now, still crashes now and then, but it's better. I'm not at my computer right now, so I can't upload the new crash logs, but the Tracking Station issues are gone now.
